name: test_e2e_with_logs[430_NOSQL_MONGO_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_MONGO_001` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $where JavaScript injection |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"$where": "this.username == 'admin'"}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20'admin'%22%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:32:55.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_001-1770813175888-qzfmvo pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_001 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20'admin'%22%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
